title: Were The Seahawks Right To Move On?
description:
Clinton Yates, Harry Lyles Jr. and Israel Gutierrez debate if the Seahawks made the right move by blowing it up and if Kyrie’s performance last night restored any of their faith in the Nets.

itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Did The Seahawks Make The Right Choice To Trade Russ?
